channel.title: Pking is on everywhere! need help turnin off
channel.description: hey, i need help turning off the pkin so i can make the whole of varrock safe zone. i have no safe zones on my sever and need help with it, many thanks *poppyjem*

item.title: Pking is on everywhere! need help turnin off
item.dc:creator: @philip_l_g philip_l_g
item.description:
@philip_l_g wrote:

if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672)) { inwildy = true;
search for that if your using cheezscape pk change true to false

item.title: Pking is on everywhere! need help turnin off
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Set this in you Client.java

[code]
public boolean nonWild() {
if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX

<= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431

&& absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX

=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||(absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 &&

absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429)||
heightLevel == 1)

return true;
else
return false;
}[/code]

With that, all is pk able except, houses in varrock, and the range training facility, hope this is good enough?

Read full topic

if i get a new source and set that up, will i still be able to use my other sever or will i have to completly delete that to make another?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 05, 2007, 01:50:22 PM[/size][hr]some one please help, im confused
